Let explanation be called from the Superintendent of Police, Rajgarh (Biaora) regarding as to why non-bailable warrant issued against appellant No.6 Ratanlal S/o Khemraj has not been served.
We have no proof of any of theses infirmities in this case.
The defendants' case on this point is that in resting her arm on the window still the plaintiff failed to take reasonable care of her safety and this was a contributory factor to the accident.
The surveyor asked an acquaintance in Ahmadabad to go and verify the salvage and compare the same with damaged samples kept by the insured.
